explains: vt. 使复位；改变……的位置；使变换阵地

sentences.en: It is not possible to reposition the rug without damaging it.
sentences.cn: 想要挪动地毯又不损坏它是不可能的。

sentences.en: Mazda needs to reposition itself to boost its sales and reputation.
sentences.cn: 要想提升销量和名声，马自达公司需要对自己重新定位。

sentences.en: You can reposition the note within the diagram.
sentences.cn: 可以在关系图中对说明进行重新定位。
